Name: Yellow Helm
Description: A sturdy helm made of yellowed iron, perfect for any brave knight.

Name: Gilded Helmet
Description: A magnificent gilded helmet with intricate designs, crafted by the finest armorers in the realm.

Name: Sunburst Helm
Description: A simple yet effective helm with a sunburst design, perfect for any aspiring adventurer.

Name: Lion's Mane Helm
Description: A helm with a fierce lion's mane design, imbued with the power to boost your attack.

Name: Golden Crown
Description: A regal golden crown, fit for a king or queen, with the power to enhance your magic defense.

Name: Bumblebee Helm
Description: A fun and quirky helm with a bumblebee design, perfect for those who don't take themselves too seriously.

Name: Yellow Regal Crown
Description: A gilded crown fit for a king, with intricate engravings and a large yellow gemstone at its front.

Name: Golden Diadem
Description: A golden diadem encrusted with small yellow gemstones, fit for a queen.

Name: Yellow Royal Crown
Description: A majestic yellow crown, adorned with precious stones and imbued with magical endurance.

Name: Citrine Crown
Description: A simple yet elegant citrine crown, perfect for a noblewoman.

Name: Yellow Crown of the Sun
Description: A dazzling yellow crown that shines like the sun, increasing the wearer's magical attack power.

Name: Yellow Circlet
Description: A delicate yellow circlet adorned with small gems, perfect for a princess.

Name: Yellow Tiara
Description: A beautiful yellow tiara, fit for a young queen.

Name: Golden Headdress
Description: A magnificent headdress of fine gold filigree and precious gems fit for a queen.

Name: Sunflower Crown
Description: A charming crown of woven sunflowers that enhances your endurance.

Name: Braided Headdress
Description: A simple yet elegant headdress of braided yellow silk, perfect for a summer festival.

Name: Lion Headdress
Description: A fierce headdress of a lion's mane, imbuing the wearer with increased attack power.

Name: Butterfly Headdress
Description: A delicate headdress adorned with fluttering butterfly wings, perfect for a woodland nymph.

Name: Golden Circlet
Description: A regal circlet of polished gold that enhances the wearer's magic defense.
